Silos: # identify cval columns for each number of autos group

Expression: zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('base_') and 'c2' in x)
zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('base_') and 'c3' in x)
zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('base_') and 'c4' in x)
zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('build_') and 'c2' in x)
zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('build_') and 'c3' in x)
zones.columns.map(lambda x: x.startswith('build_') and 'c4' in x)

Description: Autos in HHs with 1 auto in base year
Autos in HHs with 2 auto in base year
Autos in HHs with 3plus auto in base year
Autos in HHs with 1 auto in build
Autos in HHs with 2 auto in build year
Autos in HHs with 3plus auto in build year

Silos: # calculate productions by purpose for accessibility benefit

Expression: access_benefit_hbc + access_benefit_hbo + access_benefit_hbr + access_benefit_hbs + access_benefit_hbw + access_benefit_nhbnw + access_benefit_nhbw + access_benefit_sch
